title: Why is my 4a Cyclical rebooting when plugged into android auto?
content:
Hello all,

I have a pixel 4a my wired android auto has been working flawlessly for a few months and then yesterday all of a sudden when I plug my phone in it starts rebooting immediately and stays in a cyclical rebooting phase until I unplug it. The head unit in my car is not even registering that the phone is plugged in. Everything on the car and phone is updated.

You guys have any ideas?

Thanks
